title: Dishwasher, Arched Skyline Viewing Windows, Soaking Baths
posting_body: Welcome to your new home at the Broadway Palace Apartments in LA, luxury apartments in Downtown Los Angeles where elegance is re-defined.
Step inside these fabulous  Downtown Los Angeles apartments and become surrounded by the sophistication and aesthetic of The Roaring Twenties.
Our new apartments in Downtown Los Angeles are complemented by all the amenities of the 21st Century.

With luxury features that include gourmet kitchens, furnished balconies and patios, and spectacular skyline views, these Downtown Los Angeles apartments for rent are the latest installation to this historical, blossoming neighborhood.
Pricing and availability are subject to change.
